scripts.clear-kv: wrangler kv:key list --binding=FILES | jq -r '.[].name' | xargs -I {} wrangler kv:key delete --binding=FILES {}
scripts.deploy: git add . && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m "Auto-deploy update $(date)" && git push origin main && wrangler deploy && npm run upload
scripts.deploy:prod: git add . && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m "Production deploy $(date)" && git push origin main && wrangler deploy --env production && npm run upload
scripts.full-deploy: npm run clear-kv && npx wrangler deploy && npm run upload
scripts.reset-deploy: npm run clear-kv && npm run deploy
